title: FD investors Alert! Mahindra Finance launches new deposit scheme offering higher rates than FDs - Zee News
content:
1. FD investors Alert! Mahindra Finance launches new deposit scheme offering higher rates than FDs  Zee News
  2. Mahindra Finance launches special deposit scheme to be offered digitally  Mint
  3. Mahindra Finance launches Special Deposit Scheme with 20 bps higher interest rate  The Financial Express
  4. M&M Finance launches special deposit schemes  Business Standard
  5. Mahindra Finance launches special deposit schemes for digitally affluent customers  Free Press Journal

description: Mahindra Financial Services Limited launched a special term deposit scheme offering impressive returns to investors.
